messages.subject: Fwd: Enjoy Life Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: After moving across the country from Pennsylvania to Oregon, I have a few things to announce. I was a bit behind, to say the least.
messages.messageBody:
After moving across the country from Pennsylvania to Oregon, I have a few
things to announce. I was a bit behind, to say the least.

http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/

<http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/> Why Do You Do What You Do? Oct Blog
Carnival
http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/10/wdydwyd/
Read the submissions we have received. Why do people unschool?

November Carnival Theme-Celebrating Life Events
http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/10/november-carnival-theme-celebrating-life-events/
This month�s theme is Celebrating Life Events. I have been thinking about
the holidays that are upcoming, both public and our personal ones, and
thinking about how celebrating has changed for me since I was a child. My
perspective shifts change the way I think, live and be. That includes
celebrating.

5 Things Your Unschooler Needs to Know
by Heather Burditt of Swiss Army Wife

Unschoolers will often challenge the use of the words �have to�. I�ve
probably driven my husband crazy by answering his, �I have to�� with a
�Really? *HAVE* to?� with a big grin. But I�ve been caught in my own joke,
annoying him on purpose has only led me to question my own beliefs�
again. Read more at:
http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/09/5-things-your-unschooler-needs-to-know/

Later today I hope to have up a new question that needs answering. Come help
a fellow unschooler!

I play to announce the winners of our first give away in the next day or
two. And announce a second give away.

As always we accept any articles, blog posts, photos, etc you submit
regarding unschooling. Enjoy Life Unschooling is a site by and for radical
unschoolers.

THANK YOU!

--
www.bearthmama.com





--
www.bearthmama.com

messages.messageBody:
> We have a new look and are building in new features each week!
>
> New articles:
>
> School is Prison by Heather Burditt (Swiss Army Wife)
> http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/04/schoolisprison/
>
> Respect by Faith Void Taintor
> http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/02/on-being-and-feeling-
> respected/
>
> A new feature!!! Columns:
>
> Meredith Novak (PlaidPanties666) Attic Windows Sampler
> The Growth of Creativity
> http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/05/the-growth-of-creativity/
>
> Darcel Harmon ~Mahogany Way Mama
> Open Up!
> http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/05/open-up/
>
> Coming soon regular monthly columns by Idzie and Heather Burditt!
>
> Interviews:
>
> An interview with Sam from Lego Quest Blog an amazing activity for
> Lego Lovers!
> http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/2010/04/sam-lego-quest/
>
> coming soon, an interview with Julian Baptista, unschooler/muscian!
>
> And our huge resource page full of blog links, links to email
> groups, conference and gathering information and other resources you
> may find interesting.
> http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/resources/
>
> We are developing more ideas and adding more each week. If you want
> to participate please email us @ EnjoyLifeUnschooling@...
>
> Thanks
> ELU crew :-)
>
> Please feel free to forward this
>
> --
> www.EnjoyLifeUnschooling.com
>
> “Enjoy life. This is not a dress rehearsal.”
>
>
